name: Numb Top Hat
description:
A short narration of apathy, a steampunk setting and puzzles that will make you doubt your skills of observation. Challenge yourself to solve all puzzles or relax and question whether you really see what is right in front of you. Steam is flowing. Gears are missing.

Grab a couple of people you love and brainstorm the puzzles together or experience the atmosphere alone only to realize that the room is not built on coincidence... Combine with a cup of hot chocolate for uttermost comfort.

2 Possible endings

Puzzle difficulty: advanced

Got stuck? There’s a walkthrough video with the solutions to all puzzles: https://vimeo.com/466859468  Use responsibly.

Required disk space: ~ 2GB

Advanced bindings:

F10  to view FPS (toggle)

F11  to change Fullscreen mode (toggle)

I hope you will enjoy the journey!

Feel free to share your opinion on the game in the comments below. Both love and creative criticism very welcome!

If you have any questions about the development process I will try to answer them.

Did you have a great time? There is more stuff in the fan pack, from notification sounds to 4K wallpapers.
